author: uschindler
msg: Pass build.properties files down to Maven (fixes bug with ASF Jenkins after restructuring the Jenkins config to use property files)
Clean property handling: it reads now consistently everywhere solely ~/lucene.build.properties, ~/build.properties, /lucene/build.properties (in this order)

author: gnodet
msg: [ARIES-885] In container managed mode, a single non thread safe entity manager is used to service all requests when no transaction is active
